section_one.title: Kontakta Flexpool Support
section_one.description: Hi! Before you reach out, we would like to warn you that we do not provide assistance on hardware-related topics. This includes overclocking GPUs and further advanced configuration of the mining software. We provide only pool-related support. If you want to get help on overclocking GPUs, optimizing mining software, etc., you can join our community and talk with people who want share their experience.

section_two.title: Reach us via the Website Messenger
section_two.description: The best way to reach us to get assistance is to use the built-in website messenger. You can find it in the bottom-right corner.

section_three.title: Join our Community
section_three.description: We also provide an official Discord Server and a Telegram Group, so you can talk with other Flexpool miners, and get assistance from our team there as well.

section_four.title: Nå oss via e-post
section_four.description: Vi tillhandahåller e-postsupport, men vi garanterar inte snabb svarstid via denna supportkanal. Vi finns tillgängliga på <email>{{email}}</email>.

section_five.title: Övriga frågor
section_five.description: För affärsrelaterade frågor, vänligen kontakta oss på <email>hq@flexpool.io</email>. Vänligen observera att vi inte tillhandahåller support via denna e-post.
